name: IX. Glare
description:
Suddenly something completely unexpected happened. There was light. None of us understood why or how. We knew for sure that none of us is responsible for it. The ruins of our civilization ignited by the glare of the sun that hung above us.
Each figure cast a shadow on the Euclid plane, creating caricatures ourselves. Mocking us. In that moment each of us understood two things.
First of all - we are not alone and that there are still things to learn. Panes of existance which we need to achieve.
And second - that despite all the differences we must remain united because the next step of our journey isn’t so obvious.
We know that three dimensions are not the end.
